title: Aim Assist Categories
description: Defines aim assist targeting categories for different items and situations. Categories specify priority values for targeting blocks and entities based on the item being held.

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of the aim assist categories file.

fields.title: Aim Assist Categories
fields.description: The root object containing the category definitions.

fields.title: Categories
fields.description: Array of aim assist category definitions.

subForm.title: Aim Assist Category
subForm.description: Defines targeting priorities for a specific category of items.

fields.title: Name
fields.description: The namespaced identifier for this category (e.g., 'minecraft:bucket').

fields.title: Priorities
fields.description: Priority values for targeting different types of targets.

fields.title: Entity Default
fields.description: Default priority for targeting entities. Higher values mean higher priority.

fields.title: Block Default
fields.description: Default priority for targeting blocks. Higher values mean higher priority.

fields.title: Blocks
fields.description: Map of block identifiers to their targeting priority values.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: Priority value for targeting this block.

fields.title: Entities
fields.description: Map of entity identifiers to their targeting priority values.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: Priority value for targeting this entity.
